Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 55th overall pick, by Lynchburg in 1976...
Injured on 4/14/1977 with a Broken Ankle, out for full season...
Injured on 5/1/1980 with a Bruised Hand, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/1984, off Porter Mcculloch (CC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/13/1984, off George Curl (PEN)...
Signed as a free agent by Troy on 2/7/1990 to a 1-year deal worth $529,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by New Jersey on 2/22/1992 to a 3-year deal worth $746,000 per year...
